nws_periods.name: Overnight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 76. Southwest wind 0 to 5 mph.

nws_periods.name: Thursday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 10am. Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 89 in the afternoon. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
